apply only one additional channel. If additional channels are applied
the equipment becomes more complex and expensive. We have
applied as many as three additional channels successfully. The range
of the multiplex channel is much less than that of the main channel
and becomes still less as additional multiplex channels are added.
If you would care to give me further information as
